item.title: Case Not Working How I Want It To
item.dc:creator: @meowmix101 meowmix101
item.description:
@meowmix101 wrote:

if i do this it still wont work…

case 823: if(objectID == 823) { if(absX >= 3250 && absY <= 3436); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((80*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[18]), 3); sendMessage("You get att exp!"); } else if(absX >= 3250 && absY <= 3438); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((80*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[18]), 3); sendMessage("You get att exp!"); } else if(absX >= 3255 && absY <= 3437); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[2]), 0); addSkillXP((80*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[18]), 3); sendMessage("You get str exp!"); } else if(absX >= 3257 && absY <= 3437); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[2]), 0); addSkillXP((80*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[18]), 3); sendMessage("You get str exp!"); } else if(absX >= 3259 && absY <= 3437); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[1]), 0); addSkillXP((80*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[18]), 3); sendMessage("You get str exp!"); } [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2008, 04:59:34 PM[/size][hr]plz anyone?

item.title: Case Not Working How I Want It To
item.dc:creator: @meowmix101 meowmix101
item.description:
@meowmix101 wrote:

Ok so i put in the cords of my dummys, but when i train on one i get all of the exp i put in. What did i do wrong?

case 823: if(objectID == 823) { if(absX >= 3250 && absY <= 3436); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((80*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[18]), 3); sendMessage("You get att exp!"); if(absX >= 3250 && absY <= 3438); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((80*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[18]), 3); sendMessage("You get att exp!"); if(absX >= 3255 && absY <= 3437); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[2]), 0); addSkillXP((80*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[18]), 3); sendMessage("You get str exp!"); if(absX >= 3257 && absY <= 3437); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[2]), 0); addSkillXP((80*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[18]), 3); sendMessage("You get str exp!"); if(absX >= 3259 && absY <= 3437); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[1]), 0); addSkillXP((80*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[18]), 3); sendMessage("You get str exp!"); }
